values: To disseminate information or knowledge means to distribute it.
The organization disseminates information about the dangers of smoking.
vt. 宣传，传播；散布 vi. 散布；广为传播

vt. 散布, 传播

时 态:  
disseminated, disseminating, disseminates 

名 词:  
dissemination

名 词:  
disseminator
to scatter or spread widely, broadcast
v. <正式>散布，传播（信息、知识等）
